alert.note: Alert for Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 5:47PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN TYLER COUNTY THROUGH 630 PM CST... At 546 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Warren, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Warren, Fred, Town Bluff, Spurger, Ivanhoe, and Hillister. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
